oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ssauken. A game played among the Bushmen, in which both sexes appear to take part. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-26. 8335-8350). It seems to resemble a dance in the people's movements. 1) Date on p.8343: 26 March, 2) p.8336v: the korhaan malkop's cry resembles a roar, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-26.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ssauken (a game)
